articles.author: John Hand
articles.title: Inside the crimes of Gerry 'The Monk' Hutch as mob boss arrested after European manhunt - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The fallen gang boss will almost certainly be sent home to face trial for allegedly masterminding the Regency Hotel attack
articles.content:
From running a teenage gang, Gerry Hutch became one of the wealthiest criminals in the State, suspected of masterminding a series of bank robberies.
Nicknamed The Monk for his clean living, he left … [+5661 chars]

articles.author: AFP/The Local
articles.title: Pharma giants including Germany's BioNTech set to make billions from Covid-19 booster jab - The Local Europe
articles.description: Medical companies Pfizer, Moderna and Germany's BioNTech are expected to see soaring profits to the tune of billions of dollars from Covid-19 booster shots, analysts and investors have announced.
articles.content: Following Germany’s news that it will start offering Covid booster shots from September, the pharmaceutical companies responsible for delivering them are set to generate an income high enough to riva… [+3233 chars]
